title: Matt Bishop: The tragic parallels of two American greats
summary: American racers Mario Andretti and Phil Hill have a lot of successes in common, but also share some terrible tragedies, asMatt Bishoprecalls

qa_pairs.question: Which American driver won the Formula 1 World Championship in 1961?
What is Mario Andretti widely known for in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Winning the Formula 1 World Championship in 1978
wrong_options: Setting the fastest lap in F1 history

qa_pairs.question: Which tragic event is associated with both Mario Andretti and Phil Hill?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: The loss of fellow racers and friends during their careers
wrong_options: Both suffered severe injuries in a crash
Both lost a sibling in a racing accident
Both had their cars banned for technical violations
